Desc.entry: Informal conversation group for speakers of English as a Second Language, to practice English language skills in a supportive environment. Runs separate mens and womens sessions.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Wed 9.30-11.15 am (women-only conversation group), 11.15am-12.30pm (men-only conversation group)

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - GENERAL SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS
EDUCATION - ENGLISH FOR SPEAKERS OF OTHER LANGUAGES (ESOL)
